Headline: #39 Pershing Temporary Reroute near 41st/Indiana
ShortDescription: 39 Pershing buses temp. rerouted Eastbound: 41st, Prairie and 39th; Westbound 39th, Prairie, 41st and Wabash: due to, street blockage near 41st/Indiana..

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#39 Pershing  buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 41st/Indiana due to street blockage near 41st/Indiana

Eastbound buses will operate via 41st, Prairie and 39th including the normal route streets at the beginning and end.

Westbound buses will operate via 39th, Prairie, 41st and Wabash.

Allow extra travel time.
